verblex: 1. To make a very loud, high-pitched noise with your voice and mouth, usually because you are in pain or are very frightened. English = scream, cry out.
2. To make a sudden loud scream. English = shriek.
nomlex: 1. A very loud, high-pitched noise made with your voice and mouth, usually because you are in pain or are very frightened. English = scream, cry.
2. A sudden loud scream. English = shriek.
